Office of the Governor — Executive Clemency & Public Safety Records

Record purpose

This administrative record preserves OPRA requests concerning executive clemency decisions and related public-safety impact records.

Public request thread (OPRAmachine)

  • OPRAmachine body page: Office of the Governor
  • Requests by filer: User profile

Note: Add the direct request URL here once available on OPRAmachine.

Current status

  • Opened: December 18, 2025
  • Status: Refused
  • Last updated: 2025-12-18

Timeline

Documents and productions

This repository separates working files from public releases:

  • Internal working set (not published): _opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/
  • Public releases (published): /assets/opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/

Requests filed (outgoing)

Outgoing request letters, clarifications, and fee waiver materials.

  • Public copies (when posted): /assets/opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/requests/

Agency correspondence

Acknowledgements, extensions, delivery issues, portal messages.

  • Public copies (when posted): /assets/opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/correspondence/

Agency responses

Determinations (denial/refusal/partial grant), “no records,” fee estimates, and redaction explanations.

  • Public copies (when posted): /assets/opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/responses/

Productions (records received)

Responsive records produced by the agency (PDF/CSV/XLSX/images/zips).

  • Public productions (when posted): /assets/opra/governor-clemency-public-safety-2025/productions/

Notes

  • “Refused” reflects the agency’s determination as recorded in the timeline and response documents.
  • If an appeal, follow-up request, or clarification is filed, log it in the timeline and update last_updated.

Precision. Patience. Virtue. Honor.

Citizen accountability through record, dignity, and due process.
